TRANSALTE~

About These Notes

If you are new to Max / Max For Live, (or needing a refresh) it is recommended to read through the Max Fundamentals section. The L09 section deals with creating Audio Effect Devices and L10 covers instruments and sequencing.

Max Fundamentals

  • Max Fundamentals : A reference for the fundamentals of Max / Max For Live

  • Max Shortcuts : A list of regular shortcuts in Max

  • Max/Max For Live Resources : Related online resources, books and articles.

  • Routing : Routing messages, signals, bypassing, selecting

  • Max Time Formats : Details on how Max deals with timing formats

  • Encapsulation : Working with sub-patches

  • LFO Modulation : Building LFO's for modulation

L09 Notes

  • Introduction Device : Building a basic filter

  • Delay Effects : Creating delays

  • Chorus Effect : Creating chorus-related effects

L10 Notes

Why transalte?

The name comes from a habitual typo from using the `translate` object.
